IndicatorAssignment.name: IndicatorAssignment
IndicatorAssignment.description: Represents the assignment of an indicator definition that's used to measure the performance of an outcome or a related activity.

CareProgramId.description: The care program associated with the indicator assignment.

IndicatorAssignmentType.description: Specifies the object that the indicator assignment measures.

IndicatorDefinitionId.description: The indicator definition that's associated with the indicator assignment.

IndicatorImprvGuideline.description: The guidelines to improve the indicator score.

IntendedDirection.description: Specifies the intended direction of change in the behavior, knowledge, skills, status, or level of functioning that's detailed in the parent indicator definition.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, and LastReferenceDate is not null, the user accessed this record or list view indirectly.

Name.description: The name of the indicator assignment.

OutcomeId.description: The outcome that the indicator assignment measures.

OwnerId.description: The owner of this indicator assignment.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the indicator assignment.
